messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

Did you want sandbox.go to be displayed with the Go Local page?

> https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=90759b972266 ***

> R=golang-dev, dsymonds
> CC=golang-dev
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12976043

> https://codereview.appspot.com/12976043/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=90759b972266 ***

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12976043

No https://codereview.appspot.com/12977043

subject: code review 12976043: go-tour: add missing sandbox.go file
